attributes.action: Give Lowestoft A Third Bridge Called Brooke Marine Bridge for Car's and Cycle's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Give Lowestoft A Third Bridge Called Brooke Marine Bridge for Car's and Cycle's.

  THE PROPOSED ROUTE: Starting on Victoria Road threw to the bottom of Heath Road onto a New Road called Brookes Road leading up to the old Brooke Marine ship Yard and the new Brooke Marine Bridge carrying on the Brookes Road threw back of Lakeland Drive into Normanston Park and onto Normanston Drive. 

   The Government say Lowestoft does not need a Third River Crossing and is not a priority However; Lowestoft has lots of Tourism as well as full working Port which Handles Industrial Shipping Traffic from Europe and further. With lots of facility’s including, Container, Bulk, General Cargo Handling, Grain Silo, Warehouses, Ship Fuelling Station,  Construction,  Shipment,  Offshore oil, Gas Industry, Wind-Energy Turbines, Dry Dock, Slipway,  Small Fish Market  with Auction and Processing. All of this is creating vital jobs and need's to be supported by better transport Link's.
